contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=December 2009}} {{Orphan|date=January 2008}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Patchacan |image_skyline = PachakanBelize001.jpg |imagesize = 300px |image_caption = A public park on the south end of town |image_flag = |image_seal = |pushpin_map = Belize |pushpin_mapsize = 300 |map_caption = |coordinates_region = BZ |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_name = {{Flag|Belize}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Districts of Belize|District]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Corozal District]] |subdivision_type2 = |subdivision_name2 = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = |area_total_sq_mi = |area_land_km2 = |area_land_sq_mi = |area_water_km2 = |area_water_sq_mi = |area_water_percent = |area_urban_km2 = |area_urban_sq_mi = |area_metro_km2 = |area_metro_sq_mi = |population_as_of = 2000 |population_note = |population_total = 1142 |population_density_km2 = |population_density_sq_mi = |population_metro = |population_density_metro_km2 = |population_density_metro_sq_mi = |population_urban = |timezone = [[Central Time zone|Central]] |utc_offset = -6 |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |latd=18|latm=24|lats=02 |latNS=N |longd=88 |longm=28|longs=21 |longEW=W |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Patchacan''' is a [[town]] in the [[Corozal District]], in northern [[Belize]].<ref>http://belize.mybelize.net/index.php?section=35</ref><ref>http://www.belmopancityonline.com/belize-districts.aspx</ref> According to the 2000 census, it had a population of 1,142 people. ==References== {{reflist}} {{Coord|18|24|02|N|88|28|21|W|region:BZ_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Populated places in Belize]] {{Belize-geo-stub}}
